mcp_tool: name='configuration_view' title=None description='Get the current Kubernetes configuration content as a kubeconfig YAML' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'properties': {'minified': {'type': 'boolean', 'description': 'Return a minified version of the configuration. If set to true, keeps only the current-context and the relevant pieces of the configuration for that context. If set to false, all contexts, clusters, auth-infos, and users are returned in the configuration. (Optional, default true)'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Configuration: View', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

minified.description: Return a minified version of the configuration. If set to true, keeps only the current-context and the relevant pieces of the configuration for that context. If set to false, all contexts, clusters, auth-infos, and users are returned in the configuration. (Optional, default true)

tool_spec.name: configuration_view
tool_spec.description: Get the current Kubernetes configuration content as a kubeconfig YAML

mcp_tool: name='events_list' title=None description='List all the Kubernetes events in the current cluster from all namespaces' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'properties': {'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Optional Namespace to retrieve the events from. If not provided, will list events from all namespaces'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Events: List', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

namespace.description: Optional Namespace to retrieve the events from. If not provided, will list events from all namespaces

tool_spec.name: events_list
tool_spec.description: List all the Kubernetes events in the current cluster from all namespaces

mcp_tool: name='helm_install' title=None description='Install a Helm chart in the current or provided namespace' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['chart'], 'properties': {'chart': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Chart reference to install (for example: stable/grafana, oci://ghcr.io/nginxinc/charts/nginx-ingress)'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Helm release (Optional, random name if not provided)'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to install the Helm chart in (Optional, current namespace if not provided)'}, 'values': {'type': 'object', 'description': 'Values to pass to the Helm chart (Optional)'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Helm: Install', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

chart.description: Chart reference to install (for example: stable/grafana, oci://ghcr.io/nginxinc/charts/nginx-ingress)

name.description: Name of the Helm release (Optional, random name if not provided)

namespace.description: Namespace to install the Helm chart in (Optional, current namespace if not provided)

values.description: Values to pass to the Helm chart (Optional)

tool_spec.name: helm_install
tool_spec.description: Install a Helm chart in the current or provided namespace

mcp_tool: name='helm_list' title=None description='List all the Helm releases in the current or provided namespace (or in all namespaces if specified)' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'properties': {'all_namespaces': {'type': 'boolean', 'description': 'If true, lists all Helm releases in all namespaces ignoring the namespace argument (Optional)'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to list Helm releases from (Optional, all namespaces if not provided)'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Helm: List', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

all_namespaces.description: If true, lists all Helm releases in all namespaces ignoring the namespace argument (Optional)

namespace.description: Namespace to list Helm releases from (Optional, all namespaces if not provided)

tool_spec.name: helm_list
tool_spec.description: List all the Helm releases in the current or provided namespace (or in all namespaces if specified)

mcp_tool: name='helm_uninstall' title=None description='Uninstall a Helm release in the current or provided namespace' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['name'], 'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Helm release to uninstall'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to uninstall the Helm release from (Optional, current namespace if not provided)'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Helm: Uninstall', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=True, idempotentHint=True, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

name.description: Name of the Helm release to uninstall

namespace.description: Namespace to uninstall the Helm release from (Optional, current namespace if not provided)

tool_spec.name: helm_uninstall
tool_spec.description: Uninstall a Helm release in the current or provided namespace

mcp_tool: name='namespaces_list' title=None description='List all the Kubernetes namespaces in the current cluster' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'properties': {}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Namespaces: List', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

tool_spec.name: namespaces_list
tool_spec.description: List all the Kubernetes namespaces in the current cluster

mcp_tool: name='pods_delete' title=None description='Delete a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['name'], 'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod to delete'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to delete the Pod from'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: Delete', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=True, idempotentHint=True, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

name.description: Name of the Pod to delete

namespace.description: Namespace to delete the Pod from

tool_spec.name: pods_delete
tool_spec.description: Delete a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name

mcp_tool: name='pods_exec' title=None description='Execute a command in a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name and command' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['name', 'command'], 'properties': {'command': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'Command to execute in the Pod container. The first item is the command to be run, and the rest are the arguments to that command. Example: ["ls", "-l", "/tmp"]', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}, 'container': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod container where the command will be executed (Optional)'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod where the command will be executed'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace of the Pod where the command will be executed'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: Exec', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=True, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

command.description: Command to execute in the Pod container. The first item is the command to be run, and the rest are the arguments to that command. Example: ["ls", "-l", "/tmp"]

container.description: Name of the Pod container where the command will be executed (Optional)

name.description: Name of the Pod where the command will be executed

namespace.description: Namespace of the Pod where the command will be executed

tool_spec.name: pods_exec
tool_spec.description: Execute a command in a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name and command

mcp_tool: name='pods_get' title=None description='Get a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['name'], 'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to get the Pod from'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: Get', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

namespace.description: Namespace to get the Pod from

tool_spec.name: pods_get
tool_spec.description: Get a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name

mcp_tool: name='pods_list' title=None description='List all the Kubernetes pods in the current cluster from all namespaces' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'properties': {'labelSelector': {'type': 'string', 'description': "Optional Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label", 'pattern': '([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9]'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: List', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

labelSelector.description: Optional Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label

tool_spec.name: pods_list
tool_spec.description: List all the Kubernetes pods in the current cluster from all namespaces

mcp_tool: name='pods_list_in_namespace' title=None description='List all the Kubernetes pods in the specified namespace in the current cluster' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['namespace'], 'properties': {'labelSelector': {'type': 'string', 'description': "Optional Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label", 'pattern': '([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9]'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to list pods from'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: List in Namespace', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

labelSelector.description: Optional Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label

tool_spec.name: pods_list_in_namespace
tool_spec.description: List all the Kubernetes pods in the specified namespace in the current cluster

mcp_tool: name='pods_log' title=None description='Get the logs of a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['name'], 'properties': {'container': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod container to get the logs from (Optional)'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod to get the logs from'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to get the Pod logs from'}, 'previous': {'type': 'boolean', 'description': 'Return previous terminated container logs (Optional)'}, 'tail': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Number of lines to retrieve from the end of the logs (Optional, default: 100)', 'default': 100, 'minimum': 0}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: Log', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

container.description: Name of the Pod container to get the logs from (Optional)

name.description: Name of the Pod to get the logs from

namespace.description: Namespace to get the Pod logs from

tail.description: Number of lines to retrieve from the end of the logs (Optional, default: 100)

tool_spec.name: pods_log
tool_spec.description: Get the logs of a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided name

mcp_tool: name='pods_run' title=None description='Run a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided container image and optional name' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['image'], 'properties': {'image': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Container Image to run in the Pod'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod (Optional, random name if not provided)'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to run the Pod in'}, 'port': {'type': 'number', 'description': 'TCP/IP port to expose from the Pod container (Optional, no port exposed if not provided)'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: Run', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

image.description: Container Image to run in the Pod

name.description: Name of the Pod (Optional, random name if not provided)

namespace.description: Namespace to run the Pod in

port.description: TCP/IP port to expose from the Pod container (Optional, no port exposed if not provided)

tool_spec.name: pods_run
tool_spec.description: Run a Kubernetes Pod in the current or provided namespace with the provided container image and optional name

mcp_tool: name='pods_top' title=None description='List the resource consumption (CPU and memory) as recorded by the Kubernetes Metrics Server for the specified Kubernetes Pods in the all namespaces, the provided namespace, or the current namespace' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'properties': {'all_namespaces': {'type': 'boolean', 'description': 'If true, list the resource consumption for all Pods in all namespaces. If false, list the resource consumption for Pods in the provided namespace or the current namespace', 'default': True}, 'label_selector': {'type': 'string', 'description': "Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label (Optional, only applicable when name is not provided)", 'pattern': '([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9]'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the Pod to get the resource consumption from (Optional, all Pods in the namespace if not provided)'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Namespace to get the Pods resource consumption from (Optional, current namespace if not provided and all_namespaces is false)'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Pods: Top', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=True, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

all_namespaces.description: If true, list the resource consumption for all Pods in all namespaces. If false, list the resource consumption for Pods in the provided namespace or the current namespace

label_selector.description: Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label (Optional, only applicable when name is not provided)

name.description: Name of the Pod to get the resource consumption from (Optional, all Pods in the namespace if not provided)

namespace.description: Namespace to get the Pods resource consumption from (Optional, current namespace if not provided and all_namespaces is false)

tool_spec.name: pods_top
tool_spec.description: List the resource consumption (CPU and memory) as recorded by the Kubernetes Metrics Server for the specified Kubernetes Pods in the all namespaces, the provided namespace, or the current namespace

mcp_tool: name='resources_create_or_update' title=None description='Create or update a Kubernetes resource in the current cluster by providing a YAML or JSON representation of the resource\n(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['resource'], 'properties': {'resource': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'A JSON or YAML containing a representation of the Kubernetes resource. Should include top-level fields such as apiVersion,kind,metadata, and spec'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Resources: Create or Update', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=True, idempotentHint=True, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

resource.description: A JSON or YAML containing a representation of the Kubernetes resource. Should include top-level fields such as apiVersion,kind,metadata, and spec

tool_spec.name: resources_create_or_update
tool_spec.description:
Create or update a Kubernetes resource in the current cluster by providing a YAML or JSON representation of the resource
(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)

mcp_tool: name='resources_delete' title=None description='Delete a Kubernetes resource in the current cluster by providing its apiVersion, kind, optionally the namespace, and its name\n(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['apiVersion', 'kind', 'name'], 'properties': {'apiVersion': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'apiVersion of the resource (examples of valid apiVersion are: v1, apps/v1, networking.k8s.io/v1)'}, 'kind': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'kind of the resource (examples of valid kind are: Pod, Service, Deployment, Ingress)'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the resource'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Optional Namespace to delete the namespaced resource from (ignored in case of cluster scoped resources). If not provided, will delete resource from configured namespace'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Resources: Delete', readOnlyHint=False, destructiveHint=True, idempotentHint=True, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

apiVersion.description: apiVersion of the resource (examples of valid apiVersion are: v1, apps/v1, networking.k8s.io/v1)

kind.description: kind of the resource (examples of valid kind are: Pod, Service, Deployment, Ingress)

namespace.description: Optional Namespace to delete the namespaced resource from (ignored in case of cluster scoped resources). If not provided, will delete resource from configured namespace

tool_spec.name: resources_delete
tool_spec.description:
Delete a Kubernetes resource in the current cluster by providing its apiVersion, kind, optionally the namespace, and its name
(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)

mcp_tool: name='resources_get' title=None description='Get a Kubernetes resource in the current cluster by providing its apiVersion, kind, optionally the namespace, and its name\n(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['apiVersion', 'kind', 'name'], 'properties': {'apiVersion': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'apiVersion of the resource (examples of valid apiVersion are: v1, apps/v1, networking.k8s.io/v1)'}, 'kind': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'kind of the resource (examples of valid kind are: Pod, Service, Deployment, Ingress)'}, 'name': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Name of the resource'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Optional Namespace to retrieve the namespaced resource from (ignored in case of cluster scoped resources). If not provided, will get resource from configured namespace'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Resources: Get', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

apiVersion.description: apiVersion of the resource (examples of valid apiVersion are: v1, apps/v1, networking.k8s.io/v1)

kind.description: kind of the resource (examples of valid kind are: Pod, Service, Deployment, Ingress)

namespace.description: Optional Namespace to retrieve the namespaced resource from (ignored in case of cluster scoped resources). If not provided, will get resource from configured namespace

tool_spec.name: resources_get
tool_spec.description:
Get a Kubernetes resource in the current cluster by providing its apiVersion, kind, optionally the namespace, and its name
(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)

mcp_tool: name='resources_list' title=None description='List Kubernetes resources and objects in the current cluster by providing their apiVersion and kind and optionally the namespace and label selector\n(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)' inputSchema={'type': 'object', 'required': ['apiVersion', 'kind'], 'properties': {'apiVersion': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'apiVersion of the resources (examples of valid apiVersion are: v1, apps/v1, networking.k8s.io/v1)'}, 'kind': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'kind of the resources (examples of valid kind are: Pod, Service, Deployment, Ingress)'}, 'labelSelector': {'type': 'string', 'description': "Optional Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label", 'pattern': '([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9]'}, 'namespace': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Optional Namespace to retrieve the namespaced resources from (ignored in case of cluster scoped resources). If not provided, will list resources from all namespaces'}}} outputSchema=None icons=None annotations=ToolAnnotations(title='Resources: List', readOnlyHint=True, destructiveHint=False, idempotentHint=False, openWorldHint=True) meta=None

apiVersion.description: apiVersion of the resources (examples of valid apiVersion are: v1, apps/v1, networking.k8s.io/v1)

kind.description: kind of the resources (examples of valid kind are: Pod, Service, Deployment, Ingress)

labelSelector.description: Optional Kubernetes label selector (e.g. 'app=myapp,env=prod' or 'app in (myapp,yourapp)'), use this option when you want to filter the pods by label

namespace.description: Optional Namespace to retrieve the namespaced resources from (ignored in case of cluster scoped resources). If not provided, will list resources from all namespaces

tool_spec.name: resources_list
tool_spec.description:
List Kubernetes resources and objects in the current cluster by providing their apiVersion and kind and optionally the namespace and label selector
(common apiVersion and kind include: v1 Pod, v1 Service, v1 Node, apps/v1 Deployment, networking.k8s.io/v1 Ingress)
